mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_GROUP_MAPPING AS A LEFT JOIN TB_GROUP AS B ON (A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID) WHERE (B.GROUP_NAME = "개발1팀" AND USERNAME = #{userName}) or #{userName} = "admin"
SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS no, A.* FROM tb_user A, (SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) AS R order by A.USERNAME
SELECT U.USERNAME, U.REALNAME FROM (SELECT USERNAME , GROUP_ID FROM TB_GROUP_MAPPING WHERE GROUP_ID = #{groupId}) AS M LEFT JOIN TB_USER AS U ON (U.USERNAME = M.USERNAME)
select U.* from TB_USER as U where U.USERNAME not in ( select USERNAME from TB_GROUP_MAPPING where GROUP_ID = #{groupId} )
